meanings: take one´s time with the meal

vlive.korean: [실패할 Feel이 좋았나 보다...] - 천천히 해 - 그렇지! [Nice but failed] - Take it easy. - There you go! 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7

vlive.korean: 빨리 만들자 빨리 - 아니야 천천히 - 아직이야? Let's hurry! - No, take it slow. - Not yet? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST] 뉴이스트의 심야식당 - 오늘을 읽어주는 남자들 part.6

vlive.korean: 천천히 무제한 - 그러니까 4기가가 아예 끝나면? I get endless data connection at low speed. - So that's after you run out of your 4 gigabytes? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 혀니비니🐖🐇🦡
vlive.english: I get endless data connection at low speed. - So that's after you run out of your 4 gigabytes?

vlive.korean: [STEP 14, 반죽에 유자청을 넣어줍니다] - 이거를... - 다 부어요? 조금만 천천히? [STEP 14, Put the citron preserve] - This.. - All of it? Little by little slowly? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [V PICK! HOW TO in V] 정수빈의 유자머핀🍋🍞 (HOW TO COOK JungSuBin’s citron muffin)
vlive.english: [STEP 14, Put the citron preserve] - This.. - All of it? Little by little slowly?
